emf.label: EMF Label 5
emf.hint: Obtained using the EMF meter, when all lights are on except during hunts

temps.label: Freezing Temperatures
temps.hint: Detected when you can see your own breath, or when using the thermometer and getting temperatures 0C/32F or lower

dots.label: D.O.T.S
dots.hint: Obtained by seeing a ghost running through the green dots when the DOTS sensor is placed

box.label: Spirit Box
box.hint: Obtained by asking questions to the radio-looking device in the dark near the ghost

writing.label: Ghost Writing
writing.hint: Obtained by leaving an open notebook in the ghost room for a while

fingerprints.label: Fingerprints
fingerprints.hint: Detected when flashing UV light on surfaces such as doors, windows and switches touched by the ghost
